text: Timimathi (hajaka dinaharuma vyaparako madhyamabata) aphno jivika prapta garnuma kehi papa chaina. Jaba timiharu araphatabata pharkanchau, taba ‘‘masarula haramama’’ (mujadalephama) allahala'i smarana gara, ra usako smarana tyasari gara jasari usale timiharula'i adesa gareko cha yadyapi yasabhanda agadi timiharu bato vira'eka thiyau
